alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 8:50AM MST until December 01 at 7:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility along I15 from Monida Pass to Lima. The hazardous conditions could impact the peak travel times through Thursday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
